pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiplicative Competitive Interaction (MCI) Model // The Multiplicative Competitive Interaction (MCI) Model by Nakanishi Cooper (1974) DOI:10.2307/3151146 is an econometric model for analyzing market shares and/or market areas. The functions in this package include fitting the MCI model, the log-centering transformation of MCI datasets and tools for data preparation.
